text: Nɨ oragh. Ikiavɨra Itir God uabɨ nɨ gamizɨ gumazir nɨn apanim gamiba, nɨ uabɨ me mɨsoghezir puvatɨ. Puvatɨzɨ, men ghuzibar osɨmtɨzim nɨn ikiam. Ezɨ Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn zurara itimɨn ziamɨn, kɨ guizbangɨra pamtemɨn mɨgɨa ghaze, mɨzazir God Nabal danɨngamim, a uaghan nɨn apaniba kamaghɨra me damuam.
